channel.title: Help wit lothys pvpscape!
channel.description: well atm i am using lothys PvpScape and it has came to my attention that there is a bug that i have no idea how ot fix! When you teleport, you appear verry small and cannot move! the only way to move again is to log and log back in, is there any way to fix this??? thanx!!!

item.title: Help wit lothys pvpscape!
item.dc:creator: @pk4pk pk4pk
item.description:
@pk4pk wrote:

I say you best leave it like it is and not tamper with it…I like that because it causes players to think that when they mass click they cant, Added to my server…Unoscapepk =p

Read full topic

item.title: Help wit lothys pvpscape!
item.dc:creator: @the_cow_slay the cow slay
item.description:
@the_cow_slay wrote:

Portals. Nice idea although don't place them too close to each other. It lags like hell. Trust me. -.-
lol okay dude! [quote="r.v.d.p, post:5, topic:74404"]there is a tut for that here it is: [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,71729.0.html]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,71729.0.html[/url][/quote]

thanx!!! ill see if it works in a bit, coz if it just fixes the animation and not the bug, itll probz freeze when i tele! well ill ava look then! thanx!

EDIT: didnt work…

item.title: Help wit lothys pvpscape!

item.description:
@I_Br3ndan_I wrote:

the cow slay:

hmmmmm, nota bad idea actualy! my main city is Ardougne so i could just have like a series of portals to get arround… i duno not sure… but i still would like a fix, thanx

Portals. Nice idea although don’t place them too close to each other. It lags like hell. Trust me. -.-

item.title: Help wit lothys pvpscape!
item.dc:creator: @I_Br3ndan_I I Br3ndan I
item.description:
@I_Br3ndan_I wrote:

Tbh, I think all servers are better without teleportation spells, unless they take you to places needed like Jad, Smithing etc. It just causes people to mass. I don’t know how to fix this sorry but I think you should disable all the teleportation spells so that you have to High Alch to gain Magic exp.

Read full topic
